page.title: 19SHOPPING SURVEY 2
page.content: Of the 20 shops to whom we sent the qustionnaire, only 16 replied. We do not know why the other 4 did not. Five of the shops had suffered break-ins, one of them only two weeks before. They would not tell us how much had been stolen. All the shops said their trade had gone down since{ASDA}opened in Rogerstone. Also, 6 shops have closed in the same time. There is a new by pass road being built around Risca, and all shopkeepers are worried about how this will effect their trade. When we asked our parents, we found that most families do their grocery shopping in{ASDA}and the average weekly bill there for our families is twenty seven pounds.
